body:
Pushover module

Send push messages to your iOS and Android devices through pushover.net
pushover
Tangler\Module\Pushover\Module

Action: New message action

This action sends a new pushover message
new_message
Tangler\Module\Pushover\SendMessageAction
  • token (string): App token
  • userkey (string): User key
  • message (string): Message contents
